entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Donald Trump you have no pride for America. You only have a big ego. You kill! Where were you when the sick were dying? You were hiding and denying them the help and treatment they needed. Telling citizens to quote" Inject yourselves with disinfectant, to kill the covid19".
